column1: Pastor Bill Weaver will conduct services at 11:00am Tuesday
column3: 2015 at Seymour Christian Church at 915 Kasting Road. Visitation will be on Monday from 4:00pm until 8:00pm at Woodlawn Life Celebration Centre at 311 Holiday Sq. Rd. and then on Tuesday from 10:00am until service time at the church. Burial will follow services at Riverview Cemetery with full military honors
